description: In the quiet basement of an out-of-business building, Jax Dylan has come to hide.  This has been the place where he thinks deeply, without distraction.  But on this warm afternoon, another shares the musty air with Jax.  A young man named Brandon Bronco snuck into the basement through an open window.  He planned on taking a nap down there between his classes at the community college, but found something much more exciting than just a empty space.   </br></br>He could tell that Jax was hungry to blow his hot cum load.  So was he.  Only their eyes spoke to each other, but they said plenty.  Simultaneously, they pulled out their large, swollen cocks and stroked, side-by-side, separated only by a chain linked fence.  Excitement and heavy breathing filled the space between them.  Join these two as they stroke with each other...FOR each other.  </br></br>Enjoy!
title: Stroke of Two
